dct_alternative_sm: Market Village Map of India : digital map of Market Village points of India, 2011
dct_description_sm: This point shapefile represents market villages of India. Markets may be held daily, weekly or monthly. The identification of the market village is from the 2011 Census of India. The location coordinates are from satellite images, and all villages over 5000 population are placed on the village settlement. In the present database, several features have been added from the Village Asset tables of the District Census Hanbook of 2011.

This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for village level demographic analysis within basic applications to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
Village points aligned with imagery, aggregate and % figures verified
This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dct_rights_sm: These data are licensed by Stanford Libraries and are available to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students. Non affiliates seeking access should contact the publisher directly. These data may not be reproduced or used for any purpose without permission.
